title: Google search results
content: Ever since the new firefox update I am having problems with google's search results page. If I try scrolling up or down with the Up/Down arrows or the PageUp/Down buttons. It's as if there is suggestions still hidden on the page that it still wants to scroll through. Is there something I can do to fix this?
creator: crispyhq

title: Website doesn't remember computer and brwoser
content: I wonder if there is any change to the firefox. After I re-install the system, I notice every few days my active login to sites such yahoo mail and facebook will gone. Not only I need to enter password but also I will have to enter txt verification code again as I never log in those site before.
creator: hchsiao
